dialog.speaker: Mesero
dialog.spanish: ¡Hola! ¿Tienen una reserva?
dialog.english: Hello! Do you have a reservation?

dialog.speaker: Cliente
dialog.spanish: Hola. No, no tenemos. ¿Hay una mesa para dos?
dialog.english: Hello. No, we don't. Is there a table for two?

dialog.speaker: Mesero
dialog.spanish: Sí, por aquí, por favor. Aquí está el menú.
dialog.english: Yes, this way, please. Here is the menu.

dialog.speaker: Cliente
dialog.spanish: Gracias. Me gustaría un vaso de agua, por favor.
dialog.english: Thank you. I would like a glass of water, please.

dialog.speaker: Mesero
dialog.spanish: Claro. Vuelvo en un momento para tomar su orden.
dialog.english: Of course. I'll be back in a moment to take your order.

questions.question: ¿Qué le da el mesero al cliente?

dialog.speaker: Mesera
dialog.spanish: ¿Qué van a pedir?
dialog.english: What are you going to order?

dialog.speaker: Cliente A
dialog.spanish: Yo quiero el pollo con arroz, por favor.
dialog.english: I want the chicken with rice, please.

dialog.speaker: Cliente B
dialog.spanish: Yo quiero el pescado. ¿Y qué me recomiendas para beber?
dialog.english: I want the fish. And what do you recommend for a drink?

dialog.speaker: Mesera
dialog.spanish: Recomiendo el jugo de naranja. Es delicioso.
dialog.english: I recommend the orange juice. It's delicious.

dialog.speaker: Cliente B
dialog.spanish: Perfecto, me gustaría el jugo de naranja, gracias.
dialog.english: Perfect, I would like the orange juice, thank you.

questions.question: ¿Qué le recomienda la mesera al Cliente B?

dialog.speaker: Cliente
dialog.spanish: ¡Mesero! La cuenta, por favor.
dialog.english: Waiter! The bill, please.

dialog.speaker: Mesero
dialog.spanish: Claro, aquí la tiene. Son veinte dólares.
dialog.english: Of course, here you go. It's twenty dollars.

dialog.speaker: Cliente
dialog.spanish: Gracias. ¿Puedo pagar con tarjeta de crédito?
dialog.english: Thank you. Can I pay with a credit card?

dialog.speaker: Mesero
dialog.spanish: Sí, sin problema. ¿Todo estuvo bien?
dialog.english: Yes, no problem. Was everything good?

dialog.speaker: Cliente
dialog.spanish: Sí, todo estuvo delicioso, gracias.
dialog.english: Yes, everything was delicious, thank you.

dialog.speaker: Carla
dialog.spanish: Esta ensalada es muy buena.
dialog.english: This salad is very good.

dialog.speaker: Leo
dialog.spanish: Sí, a mí me gusta. Mi pollo con verduras también es muy bueno.
dialog.english: Yes, I like it. My chicken with vegetables is also very good.

dialog.speaker: Carla
dialog.spanish: ¿Y el postre? ¿Qué vas a pedir de postre?
dialog.english: And dessert? What are you going to order for dessert?

dialog.speaker: Leo
dialog.spanish: No lo sé. Me gusta el helado de chocolate.
dialog.english: I don't know. I like the chocolate ice cream.

dialog.speaker: Carla
dialog.spanish: Yo creo que no voy a pedir postre. Estoy llena.
dialog.english: I don't think I'm going to order dessert. I am full.

dialog.speaker: Sofía
dialog.spanish: ¿Qué bebes, Miguel?
dialog.english: What are you drinking, Miguel?

dialog.speaker: Miguel
dialog.spanish: Bebo agua. ¿Quieres un poco de pan?
dialog.english: I'm drinking water. Do you want some bread?

dialog.speaker: Sofía
dialog.spanish: Sí, gracias. ¿Te gusta el jugo de manzana?
dialog.english: Yes, thank you. Do you like apple juice?

dialog.speaker: Miguel
dialog.spanish: Sí, me gusta, pero hoy prefiero agua. El pescado es muy salado.
dialog.english: Yes, I like it, but today I prefer water. The fish is very salty.

dialog.speaker: Sofía
dialog.spanish: Entiendo. Yo prefiero la leche para el desayuno.
dialog.english: I understand. I prefer milk for breakfast.

sentences.spanish: Fui a cenar en un restaurante nuevo. Me senté en una mesa para uno.
sentences.english: I went to dinner at a new restaurant. I sat at a table for one.

sentences.spanish: El mesero me dio el menú y me preguntó qué quería beber.
sentences.english: The waiter gave me the menu and asked what I wanted to drink.

sentences.spanish: Pedí un vaso de agua y luego miré el menú.
sentences.english: I asked for a glass of water and then I looked at the menu.

sentences.spanish: Para la comida, pedí el pescado con verduras. Era delicioso.
sentences.english: For the food, I ordered the fish with vegetables. It was delicious.

sentences.spanish: Después, comí un postre de helado. Fue muy dulce.
sentences.english: Afterwards, I ate an ice cream dessert. It was very sweet.

sentences.spanish: Cuando terminé, pedí la cuenta. El mesero me la trajo rápido.
sentences.english: When I finished, I asked for the bill. The waiter brought it to me quickly.

sentences.spanish: Pagué y me fui, muy feliz con la comida.
sentences.english: I paid and left, very happy with the food.

sentences.spanish: Mi comida favorita es el pollo. Me gusta comer pollo frito o asado.
sentences.english: My favorite food is chicken. I like to eat fried or roasted chicken.

sentences.spanish: Para el plato principal, siempre pido pollo con arroz.
sentences.english: For the main dish, I always order chicken with rice.

sentences.spanish: También me gusta mucho la ensalada. Las verduras son buenas para la salud.
sentences.english: I also really like salad. Vegetables are good for your health.

sentences.spanish: Para beber, me gusta el jugo de manzana, pero a veces pido agua.
sentences.english: To drink, I like apple juice, but sometimes I order water.

sentences.spanish: El postre que más me gusta es el helado de fresa.
sentences.english: The dessert that I like the most is strawberry ice cream.

sentences.spanish: Cuando salgo a un restaurante, siempre pido estas cosas.
sentences.english: When I go out to a restaurant, I always order these things.

sentences.spanish: Es mi comida favorita y me hace muy feliz.
sentences.english: It is my favorite food and it makes me very happy.

sentences.spanish: Hoy, mi familia y yo desayunamos juntos en casa.
sentences.english: Today, my family and I had breakfast together at home.

sentences.spanish: Mi padre cocinó pan con huevos para todos.
sentences.english: My father cooked bread with eggs for everyone.

sentences.spanish: Mi madre preparó café y yo serví el jugo de naranja.
sentences.english: My mother prepared coffee and I served the orange juice.

sentences.spanish: Mi hermana bebió un vaso de leche. A ella no le gusta el café.
sentences.english: My sister drank a glass of milk. She doesn't like coffee.

sentences.spanish: La comida era muy simple, pero estaba deliciosa.
sentences.english: The food was very simple, but it was delicious.

sentences.spanish: Hablamos y reímos mucho. Fue un desayuno muy bonito.
sentences.english: We talked and laughed a lot. It was a very nice breakfast.

sentences.spanish: Me gusta comer con mi familia. Es un buen momento del día.
sentences.english: I like to eat with my family. It's a good time of day.

speaking.title: Comida y Bebida
speaking.description: Preguntas y respuestas para practicar la conversación sobre alimentos, bebidas y restaurantes.

question.english: What is your favorite food?

answer.spanish: Mi comida favorita es el pollo con arroz.
answer.english: My favorite food is chicken with rice.

question.english: What do you drink in the morning?

answer.spanish: Yo bebo café con leche.
answer.english: I drink coffee with milk.

question.english: What would you like to order?

answer.spanish: Me gustaría pedir la ensalada, por favor.
answer.english: I would like to order the salad, please.

question.english: Do you like fish?

answer.spanish: Sí, me gusta el pescado, pero a veces es salado.
answer.english: Yes, I like fish, but sometimes it's salty.

question.english: What dessert do you recommend?

answer.spanish: Recomiendo el helado de chocolate, es delicioso.
answer.english: I recommend the chocolate ice cream, it's delicious.

question.english: Do you want water or juice?

answer.spanish: Quiero agua, gracias.
answer.english: I want water, thank you.

question.english: Where do you eat dinner?

answer.spanish: Yo ceno en casa con mi familia.
answer.english: I have dinner at home with my family.

question.english: Who is the waiter?

answer.spanish: El mesero es el hombre que está en la mesa grande.
answer.english: The waiter is the man at the big table.

question.english: What do you cook for dinner?

answer.spanish: Yo cocino pollo con verduras.
answer.english: I cook chicken with vegetables.

question.english: Do you need the menu?

answer.spanish: No, gracias, ya tengo el menú.
answer.english: No, thank you, I already have the menu.

question.english: Can you bring me the bill?

answer.spanish: Claro, aquí está la cuenta.
answer.english: Of course, here is the bill.

question.english: What dish do you like?

answer.spanish: Me gusta el plato de carne.
answer.english: I like the meat dish.

question.english: Do you eat salad with your meal?

answer.spanish: Sí, me gusta la ensalada con las verduras.
answer.english: Yes, I like salad with the vegetables.

question.english: Did you reserve a table?

answer.spanish: No, no reservé una mesa.
answer.english: No, I didn't reserve a table.

question.english: What drink do you prefer?

answer.spanish: Yo prefiero el jugo de naranja.
answer.english: I prefer orange juice.

question.english: Is the food delicious?

answer.spanish: Sí, la comida está muy deliciosa.
answer.english: Yes, the food is very delicious.

question.spanish: ¿Te gusta el pan con la comida?
question.english: Do you like bread with your meal?

answer.spanish: Sí, el pan de este restaurante es muy bueno.
answer.english: Yes, the bread from this restaurant is very good.

question.english: What are you going to eat for dessert?

answer.spanish: Voy a comer el helado de fresa.
answer.english: I am going to eat the strawberry ice cream.

question.english: You need a table for how many people?

answer.spanish: Una mesa para cuatro personas, por favor.
answer.english: A table for four people, please.

question.english: Do you want to go to a restaurant?

answer.spanish: Sí, vamos a un restaurante nuevo.
answer.english: Yes, let's go to a new restaurant.
